name: Christmas GiftTower
description:
Endless game: place gifts on top of each other, rotate them, build the largest mountain of gifts. Enjoy! Happy New Year!

Made with Unity from free assets.

Control:

  • Move gift: Mouse
  • Gift rotate: A/D, W/S, Q/E
  • Drop gift: Space or Mouse 0
  • Clear location: R
  • Take a screenshot (save in the GiftTower_Data folder): F
